summary: ANC Marketplace - E-commerce platform with admin center, product listings, and user authentication. Currently fixing admin access control initialization and UI visibility issues.
architectural_notes: Admin access control uses Internet Identity principals: e6nnr-cosry-qkhze-ku7xv-mkip5-7r7jv-vzev3-rtopc-4na67-4flnw-oqe and jghzz-cnbjn-dw57n-z26cp-muyrx-mwdbf-xr3i7-y73da-5qlgr-kxe4h-4qe with email anc.electronics.n.more@gmail.com as Owner Admin
Existing admin features include admin dashboard, financial account with transactions, and role assignment access control
known_issues: Admin Center showing 'Initialization Failed' error with 'Actor not available' message - access control not properly initialized in backend canister

existing_features.title: Change hero section text 'Our mission is your success' and 'Explore Our Services' to bold white color for visibility against the dark background
Add solid backgrounds to all popups, dropdown menus, and modal overlays throughout the application to ensure text readability when displayed over other content

new_feature_requests.summary: Initialize admin access control with two Internet Identity principals and email as Owner Admin
Change hero section text ('Our mission is your success' and 'Explore Our Services') to bold white for visibility
Add solid backgrounds to all popups, dropdowns, and menus for readability
Enhance existing admin code with any vital missing functionality

Initialize backend access control with two Owner Admin principals: e6nnr-cosry-qkhze-ku7xv-mkip5-7r7jv-vzev3-rtopc-4na67-4flnw-oqe and jghzz-cnbjn-dw57n-z26cp-muyrx-mwdbf-xr3i7-y73da-5qlgr-kxe4h-4qe, plus email anc.electronics.n.more@gmail.com

Review existing admin dashboard code (financial account with transactions, role assignment access control, admin dashboard functionality) and add any vital missing functionality to improve admin operations
